future_technology.title: Automated Signal Processing: Technology Roadmap for Full Automation
future_technology.description: A detailed overview of technologies required to achieve full automation in automated signal processing, focusing on realistic advancements within the next 5-15 years.

sensory_systems.name: Advanced Spectroscopic Sensors (Hyperspectral & THz)
sensory_systems.description: Arrays of sensors capable of simultaneously capturing spectral information across a wide range of wavelengths (UV-SWIR-THz). This would provide detailed material identification and characterization.

technical_specifications.scanning_speed: Variable, aiming for 1-10 Hz per channel for dynamic analysis

sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Spectral purity > 98%, Identification accuracy > 95% for common materials, Time-resolved spectral analysis accuracy < 1% relative to true signal

sensory_systems.name: Microphone Array with Source Localization
sensory_systems.description: Dense arrays of high-fidelity microphones coupled with advanced beamforming and source localization algorithms.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Source localization accuracy < 1 meter, Sound pressure level accuracy < 1 dB, Reverberation cancellation accuracy > 90%

sensory_systems.name: Radar Systems (mmWave & Sub-THz)
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution radar systems leveraging millimeter-wave and sub-THz frequencies for detailed 3D imaging and object tracking.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Object detection accuracy > 90%, Range accuracy < 1%, Velocity measurement accuracy < 1%

control_systems.name: Reinforcement Learning Control Loops
control_systems.description: AI-driven control systems utilizing reinforcement learning to dynamically optimize signal processing algorithms based on real-time data and performance metrics.

technical_specifications.reward_function_complexity: Variable, capable of handling complex objectives

control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Performance improvements relative to baseline algorithms > 10% within 100 training iterations.

control_systems.name: Model Predictive Control (MPC) with Adaptive Models
control_systems.description: MPC systems coupled with dynamically learned models of the signal processing system and its environment.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Tracking accuracy comparable to optimal linear controllers, with robustness to noise and disturbances.

mechanical_systems.name: Precision Robotic Arms with Integrated Sensors
mechanical_systems.description: Robotic arms designed for manipulating sensors and other components within the signal processing system.
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Sensor placement accuracy < 1 mm, Manipulation precision < 10 μm

mechanical_systems.name: Microfluidic Systems for Sample Delivery
mechanical_systems.description: Miniaturized fluid handling systems for precise sample delivery and reagent dispensing.
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Sample delivery accuracy < 10 μL, Reproducibility < 1% relative to control samples

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: A virtual representation of the entire signal processing system, enabling simulation, optimization, and predictive maintenance.

technical_specifications.simulation_fidelity: High-fidelity, accounting for sensor noise and system dynamics

software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Simulation accuracy within 5% of actual system behavior.

software_integration.name: Explainable AI (XAI) Frameworks
software_integration.description: AI models coupled with explainability tools to understand and validate the reasoning behind automated decisions.

technical_specifications.interpretability_score: High, providing clear justification for decisions
technical_specifications.counterfactual_analysis: Support for understanding sensitivity to input variables

key_research_areas: Materials Science (Novel sensor materials with enhanced sensitivity)

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in forecasting future automation technologies. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of technologies that would need to be created or refined to enable full automation in this field. Focus on realistic technological advancements that could be achieved in the next 5-15 years. For each technology, include specific technical specifications and accuracy metrics where appropriate.
input.user_message:
Create a detailed overview of future technologies needed for full automation of: Automated Signal Processing

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. sensory_systems: Array of sensing technologies with descriptions and accuracy metrics
2. control_systems: Array of control mechanisms and their capabilities
3. mechanical_systems: Array of physical components and their specifications
4. software_integration: Array of software technologies needed to coordinate everything
5. timeline_estimate: Estimated years until these technologies could be realized
6. key_research_areas: Array of critical research domains that need breakthroughs

Please return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
